list_definition.definition: a (complete) change in a person’s appearance made by cosmetic treatment, new hairstyle, new clothes etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She’s had a complete makeover since you last saw her.

list_ex_of_english: I agree that magistrates could do with a makeover.
Each episode runs for 30 minutes and features two people who get makeovers including clothes, hairstyling, and makeup.
The boys decide to turn his sweet shop into an escort service and give the place a makeover.
She came into the competition with shoulder-length bright red hair but was later given makeover to short black hair.
The excess belongings are sold at a yard sale to raise money for the makeover.
She is 4 quadrillion light years old and would like to give earth a space-age makeover.
The fifth episode begins with the four remaining couples getting wardrobe and hair makeovers, to match their new bodies.
It is rarely a disabling condition, so they gave it a makeover and it was remarketed as a serious mass scourge.
